story.title: British Museum on #AskACuratorDay 2012

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

data.text: Here is a taster from this year's Twitter event. Thank you to all the curators who gave up their time to help.
One week before the event we registered the British Museum on the website for #AskACurator Day and contacted curators across the Museum to get involved:

quote.text: @BritishMuseum have signed up for #AskaCurator

user.description: Ask questions to passionate experts on art, history and science on September 19th 2012 - www.askacuratorday.com
user.name: Ask A Curator

meta.text: @BritishMuseum have signed up for #AskaCurator

quote.text: I'll be tweeting on behalf of #AncientEgyptandSudan at the @britishmuseum for @AskACurator Day on Weds - have your questions at the ready!

user.description: Trainee Curator in Ancient Egypt and Sudan at the British Museum and Manchester Museum, Ph.D student in Egyptology at the University of Liverpool
user.name: Anna Garnett

meta.text: I'll be tweeting on behalf of #AncientEgyptandSudan at the @britishmuseum for @AskACurator Day on Weds - have your questions at the ready!

data.text:
Curators taking questions on the day:

Lisa Galvin (Africa, Oceania and the Americas)
Barrie Cook (Medieval and Early Modern Coins)
Ian Leins (Iron Age & Roman Coins)
Anna Garnett (Ancient Egypt & Sudan)
Julia Farley (European Iron Age)
Daniel Pett (Portable Antiquities)

quote.text: It’s #AskACurator day today and we have curators @britishmuseum answering your questions from 9.30. Fire away!

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: It’s #AskACurator day today and we have curators @britishmuseum answering your questions from 9.30. Fire away!

quote.text: The @britishmuseum are having a #AskACurator day from 9.30 this morning. Great opportunity to get behind the scenes!

user.description: The UK's largest local and specialist history publisher. Creators of Titanic: Her Journey http://bit.ly/yNhKMo, @TitanicRealTime and @notaguideto
user.name: The History Press

meta.text: The @britishmuseum are having a #AskACurator day from 9.30 this morning. Great opportunity to get behind the scenes!

quote.text: @britishmuseum How did you get your first job in curating?

user.description: Musings of a curatorial student... Teacake tweets on art, history, culture, museums, books & food
user.name: Teacake

meta.text: @britishmuseum How did you get your first job in curating?

quote.text: Anna, our future curator of Ancient Egypt, gained experience from volunteering in local and national Museums @tm_teacake #AskACurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: Anna, our future curator of Ancient Egypt, gained experience from volunteering in local and national Museums @tm_teacake #AskACurator

quote.text: @britishmuseum That's great, thank you for replying :)

user.description: Musings of a curatorial student... Teacake tweets on art, history, culture, museums, books & food
user.name: Teacake

meta.text: @britishmuseum That's great, thank you for replying :)

quote.text: @britishmuseum How many curators are there at the British Museum? #askacurator

user.description: Student of Archaeology, Volunteer at the Henley River and Rowing Museum.
user.name: Kirsty Caddy

meta.text: @britishmuseum How many curators are there at the British Museum? #askacurator

quote.text: @KirstyCaddy There are around 200 - 250 and they specialize in subjects from Contemporary Japan to Ancient board games #AskACurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @KirstyCaddy There are around 200 - 250 and they specialize in subjects from Contemporary Japan to Ancient board games #AskACurator

quote.text: @britishmuseum what object or artwork in your collection makes you laugh? #askacurator http://pinterest.com/erikat80/museumsarefun/

user.description: Curator, social media, new media, material culture, engagement, passionate about curating in digital mediums for engagement with material culture
user.name: Erika Taylor

meta.text: @britishmuseum what object or artwork in your collection makes you laugh? #askacurator http://t.co/yMcEhi5r

quote.text: .@erikajoy Lisa Galvin, curator of African collections, smiles when she sees this Tanzanian Kanga with Michael Jackson: http://ow.ly/dP1aB

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@erikajoy Lisa Galvin, curator of African collections, smiles when she sees this Tanzanian Kanga with Michael Jackson: http://t.co/HxE5lEFa

image.caption: This is Lisa Galvin, curator in Africa, Oceania and the Americans. Anything you'd like to ask? #AskACurator http://instagr.am/p/PwMclty4TM/

quote.text: This is Lisa Galvin, curator in Africa, Oceania and the Americans. Anything you'd like to ask? #AskACurator http://instagr.am/p/PwMclty4TM/

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: This is Lisa Galvin, curator in Africa, Oceania and the Americans. Anything you'd like to ask? #AskACurator http://t.co/vArWmrwb

quote.text: @britishmuseum are there artefacts that you passed up that you now wish you hadn't? #askacurator

meta.text: @britishmuseum are there artefacts that you passed up that you now wish you hadn't? #askacurator

quote.text: @britishmuseum hi Lisa, it's my dream to be a curator. just finished a BA and about to start my MA but what steps did you take to get there?

user.description: All singing, all dancing, museum, cathedral and manuscript loving historian. It's all make believe isn't it?!
user.name: Lauren Findler

meta.text: @britishmuseum hi Lisa, it's my dream to be a curator. just finished a BA and about to start my MA but what steps did you take to get there?

quote.text: @aliceturner Lisa says curators are always collecting. "We record life today for people tomorrow." #AskACurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @aliceturner Lisa says curators are always collecting. "We record life today for people tomorrow." #AskACurator

quote.text: .@Lauren_Findler Do fieldwork, network, write papers and volunteer. If you love what you do, you never work a day in your life! #AskACurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@Lauren_Findler Do fieldwork, network, write papers and volunteer. If you love what you do, you never work a day in your life! #AskACurator

quote.text: @britishmuseum thank you! Been trying my hardest to get voluntary work but even that is so competitive #keeptrying #askacurator

meta.text: @britishmuseum thank you! Been trying my hardest to get voluntary work but even that is so competitive #keeptrying #askacurator

quote.text: Couldn't agree more! “@britishmuseum: @Lauren_Findler Find a subject you are passionate about and study it as much as you can #AskACurator”

user.description: Manchester Met University's Contemporary Art History BA (Hons) degree
user.name: MMU Art History

meta.text: Couldn't agree more! “@britishmuseum: @Lauren_Findler Find a subject you are passionate about and study it as much as you can #AskACurator”

quote.text: @britishmuseum Did the peoples of these regions have a special category of art, akin to ours?

user.description: Philosopher, author, columnist. Fellow at the University of Melbourne. New book out 12/12: Philosophy in the Garden http://goo.gl/X2LLd.
user.name: Damon Young

meta.text: @britishmuseum Did the peoples of these regions have a special category of art, akin to ours?

quote.text: @damonayoung All cultures have some form of art. I'm working on contemporary sculptures from Zimbabwe at the moment: http://ow.ly/dP99D

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @damonayoung All cultures have some form of art. I'm working on contemporary sculptures from Zimbabwe at the moment: http://t.co/J8ePpTRc

quote.text: Its currently #AskACurator over at the @britishmuseum. So if you've got a question, drop them a tweet! :)

user.description: Welcome to the University of Hull's History Society twitter page where you can keep up to date with the society's comings and goings.
user.name: Hull History Society

meta.text: Its currently #AskACurator over at the @britishmuseum. So if you've got a question, drop them a tweet! :)

quote.text: @britishmuseum #askacurator have you ever been tempted to play a game of chess with the lewis chessmen?

user.description: Canadian. Dog-lover. Museum/Heritage Programming and Education.
user.name: E. Arscott

meta.text: @britishmuseum #askacurator have you ever been tempted to play a game of chess with the lewis chessmen?

quote.text: @venart Curator Julia says it would have to be a big board. One large enough for the modern game would be 82cm across! http://ow.ly/dPLqw

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @venart Curator Julia says it would have to be a big board. One large enough for the modern game would be 82cm across! http://t.co/9qiYyBOS

quote.text:
Today the Museum is participating in #AskACurator day on Twitter, where curators at the Museum will be answering your questions until 17.30. Please direct these questions on Twitter @britishmuseum and use the hashtag #AskACurator.
https://twitter.com/AskACurator

item.name: Museo de Bellas Artes de Córdoba

meta.description: Instantly connect to what's most important to you. Follow your friends, experts, favorite celebrities, and breaking news.
meta.caption: twitter.com
meta.name: Ask A Curator (AskACurator) on Twitter
meta.message:
Today the Museum is participating in #AskACurator day on Twitter, where curators at the Museum will be answering your questions until 17.30. Please direct these questions on Twitter @britishmuseum and use the hashtag #AskACurator.
https://twitter.com/AskACurator

quote.text: At @britishmuseum today. So many different languages being spoken by visitors. How important are language skills for curators? #askacurator

user.description: Museum lover. Librarian/mother of 3, good at juggling. Interested in kids in museums and libraries.
user.name: Claire Madge

meta.text: At @britishmuseum today. So many different languages being spoken by visitors. How important are language skills for curators? #askacurator

quote.text: @ClaireMadge Very important. People come from all over the world and we need to read and sometimes write publications in other languages.

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @ClaireMadge Very important. People come from all over the world and we need to read and sometimes write publications in other languages.

quote.text: #askacurator @britishmuseum so will there by anything from the London Olympic games that go into the collection?

meta.text: #askacurator @britishmuseum so will there by anything from the London Olympic games that go into the collection?

quote.text: .@trucks_here Barrie Cook, curator from coins and medals, has been actively collecting material relating to the Games!

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@trucks_here Barrie Cook, curator from coins and medals, has been actively collecting material relating to the Games!

quote.text: @britishmuseum #askacurator What makes one coin out of a countless number worthy of being displayed in the museum? Any notable examples?

user.description: Canadian. Dog-lover. Museum/Heritage Programming and Education.
user.name: E. Arscott

meta.text: @britishmuseum #askacurator What makes one coin out of a countless number worthy of being displayed in the museum? Any notable examples?

quote.text: @venart Barrie says that some are obvious but it’s because that coin best illustrates a point, about money or about history more generally.

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @venart Barrie says that some are obvious but it’s because that coin best illustrates a point, about money or about history more generally.

quote.text: @britishmuseum lf A History Of The World in 100 Objects had allowed 1 more- which from your department would you pick + why? #AskACuratorDay

user.description: Cloud gazing culture dabbler. Love Friday- prefer Saturday's. Approach without caution.
user.name: broadbandsauce

meta.text: @britishmuseum lf A History Of The World in 100 Objects had allowed 1 more- which from your department would you pick + why? #AskACuratorDay

quote.text: @broadbandsauce Curator Barrie says The Juxon medal - despite its name a unique gold £5 of King Charles I http://ow.ly/dPjnz #askacurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @broadbandsauce Curator Barrie says The Juxon medal - despite its name a unique gold £5 of King Charles I http://t.co/z70lS1Uc #askacurator

image.caption: This is curator Ian Leins, he has been answering questions on Iron Age & Roman Coins on #askacurator day. http://instagr.am/p/PwuxW0y4UN/

quote.text: This is curator Ian Leins, he has been answering questions on Iron Age & Roman Coins on #askacurator day. http://instagr.am/p/PwuxW0y4UN/

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: This is curator Ian Leins, he has been answering questions on Iron Age & Roman Coins on #askacurator day. http://t.co/mLpeBcUB

quote.text: @britishmuseum What's the best way to display Roman coins? (We've an antiquities-museum at my uni with a fair number of coins) #askacurator

meta.text: @britishmuseum What's the best way to display Roman coins? (We've an antiquities-museum at my uni with a fair number of coins) #askacurator

quote.text: .@afrikancanadian We use model railway track fixing pins(!) Avoid straight lines and grid layouts as they can put people off #AskACurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@afrikancanadian We use model railway track fixing pins(!) Avoid straight lines and grid layouts as they can put people off #AskACurator

quote.text: @britishmuseum hi always wanted to know if the horses on iron age coins are realistic and did horses really look like that back then?

meta.text: @britishmuseum hi always wanted to know if the horses on iron age coins are realistic and did horses really look like that back then?

quote.text: @museumgeek234 Ian says the horses on Iron Age coins are highly stylised like the white horses on hillsides, like modern abstract art.

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @museumgeek234 Ian says the horses on Iron Age coins are highly stylised like the white horses on hillsides, like modern abstract art.

quote.text: What are some of the more mundane things your job entails and why? curator in Ancient Egypt & Sudan #AskaCuratorDay @britishmuseum

user.description: Coupled 21 year old +7 years Exp, Egyptology/Ancient History Graduate. I now want to do a P/T MA at Birmingham 2013-2015. I also Cook and Bake
user.name: Joanna Marie Hartup

meta.text: What are some of the more mundane things your job entails and why? curator in Ancient Egypt & Sudan #AskaCuratorDay @britishmuseum

quote.text: @JoIsisMarie Anna from Ancient Egypt & Sudan says "Difficult to say but perhaps the constant battle to empty my inbox is rather mundane!"

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: @JoIsisMarie Anna from Ancient Egypt & Sudan says "Difficult to say but perhaps the constant battle to empty my inbox is rather mundane!"

quote.text: @britishmuseum If that is all then I really do envy you :)

user.description: Coupled 21 year old +7 years Exp, Egyptology/Ancient History Graduate. I now want to do a P/T MA at Birmingham 2013-2015. I also Cook and Bake
user.name: Joanna Marie Hartup

meta.text: @britishmuseum If that is all then I really do envy you :)

quote.text: #AskACurator how does the Egyptian collection in the museum impact tourism? @britishmuseum

user.description: Egyptologist in the making, graduate of Manchester's Certificate in Egyptology and Egyptology- based writer.
user.name: Michelle Low

meta.text: #AskACurator how does the Egyptian collection in the museum impact tourism? @britishmuseum

quote.text: .@ChelleHY The Egyptian collection, particularly the Rosetta Stone, attracts thousands of tourists per year #AskACurator

user.description: A museum of the world, for the world. Now open: #ShakespeareExhibition http://www.britishmuseum.org/shakespeare
user.name: British Museum

meta.text: .@ChelleHY The Egyptian collection, particularly the Rosetta Stone, attracts thousands of tourists per year #AskACurator

meta.text: @britishmuseum The guestbook? awwwww

user.description: Tweets on science, farming esp bovine TB, nature - perhaps favours the underdog but tries to be fair. May let owner - a vet - have the odd tweet.
user.name: bronwyn

meta.text: @britishmuseum Mummy of Hornedjitef?

user.description: Trainee Curator in Ancient Egypt&Sudan at the British Museum and Manchester Museum, Ph.D student in Egyptology at the University of Liverpool. All views my own.
user.name: Anna Garnett

meta.text: RT @britishmuseum: Anna's favourite object is the quartzite head of Amenhotep III, one of a pair outside the Egyptian sculpture gallery ...

quote.text: @britishmuseum ahh, I use that as a marker for anyone coming to the families desk asking 'Where's the rosetta stone?'

user.description: Canadian. Dog-lover. Museum/Heritage Programming and Education.
user.name: E. Arscott

meta.text: @britishmuseum ahh, I use that as a marker for anyone coming to the families desk asking 'Where's the rosetta stone?'

quote.text: Thank you for all your questions, that's all for #AskACurator day. Watch out tomorrow morning for some exciting news.

meta.text: Thank you for all your questions, that's all for #AskACurator day. Watch out tomorrow morning for some exciting news.

quote.text: @britishmuseum Thank you so much for taking part! #AskACurator

user.description: American mom/wife in UK. As seen on Twitter. Big on fun! @CultureThemes @MuseumCamp #savelibraries #TeensInMuseums @kidsinmuseums. Digital Social Activist.
user.name: Mar

meta.text: @britishmuseum Thank you so much for taking part! #AskACurator

data.text:
As a result of the day the Museum

- Gained 211 followers
- Received over 300 mentions
- Received 1060 clicks on links shared
- 214 re-tweets
- 34 favourites

Thanks for participating!
